album_section_description: Search albums and get information such as their artists and the territories they are available.
artists_section_description: Search artists and get information such as their music genres and albums.
hero_text: Know more about your favorites artists, albums and tracks
multilingual_feature_description: You can enjoy this app in multiple languages.
guest_warning: In order to use this app, you need to log in with your Spotify Account.
track_section_description: Search tracks and get information such as the territories they are available.
